description: Updates the specified application to have the specified properties.

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of the application to update. If no such application is found, UpdateApplication returns an InvalidParameterValue error.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A new description for the application. Default: If not specified, AWS Elastic Beanstalk does not update the description.

nested_items.name: Application
nested_items.description: The  ApplicationDescription of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: User-defined description of the application.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when the application was created.

nested_items.name: DateUpdated
nested_items.description: The date when the application was last modified.

nested_items.name: Versions
nested_items.description: The names of the versions for this application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConfigurationTemplates
nested_items.description: The names of the configuration templates associated with this application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceLifecycleConfig
nested_items.description: The lifecycle settings for the application.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM service role that Elastic Beanstalk has permission to assume.

nested_items.name: VersionLifecycleConfig
nested_items.description: Defines lifecycle settings for application versions.

nested_items.name: MaxCountRule
nested_items.description: Specify a max count rule to restrict the number of application versions that are retained for an application.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specify true to apply the rule, or false to disable it.

nested_items.name: MaxCount
nested_items.description: Specify the maximum number of application versions to retain.

nested_items.name: DeleteSourceFromS3
nested_items.description: Set to true to delete a version's source bundle from Amazon S3 when Elastic Beanstalk deletes the application version.

nested_items.name: MaxAgeRule
nested_items.description: Specify a max age rule to restrict the length of time that application versions are retained for an application.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specify true to apply the rule, or false to disable it.

nested_items.name: MaxAgeInDays
nested_items.description: Specify the number of days to retain an application versions.

nested_items.name: DeleteSourceFromS3
nested_items.description: Set to true to delete a version's source bundle from Amazon S3 when Elastic Beanstalk deletes the application version.
